Philip Loeb https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philip_Loeb 0 Philip Loeb (March 28, 1891 – September 1, 1955), was an American stage, film, and television actor. He was blacklisted under McCarthyism and committed suicide in response. Philip_Loeb ( March_28_,_1891 – September_1_,_1955 ) , was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor . He was_blacklisted under McCarthyism and committed suicide in response .
